Room.Name: The Docks
Room.Description: Despite its dusty appearance and infestations, the docks are an important part of the city. Many visitors arrive by boat, and need to have a safe place to land. You decide to watch your step, since the sweepers have not cleaned this area up yet.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river widens here, to accomodate embarking and disembarking boat passengers on both sides of the docks. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: The Catwalk
Room.Description: The catwalk above the docks is basically roughed in, wood beams supporting the upstairs office, along with various lanterns hanging down to light up the docks below. Ventilation openings allow birds to enter, making nests for their young.

Room.Name: Foreman's Ofice
Room.Description: Dispite the disarray of the docks, this office is clean and well cared for. The foreman must care about appearance, even his desk is fresly waxed and sealed.

Room.Name: Back Office
Room.Description: Well-kept and clean, the back office has a big comfortable chair in the corner where someone having a bad day could take a relaxing break. A bottle of some sort can be seen through the glass of a cabinet against the wall.

Room.Name: Storage Room
Room.Description: This storage closet is full of brooms, mops, and other cleaning equipment, along with a wide variety of solvents. Despite being full of tools for cleaning, it is anything but. Rats and critters have made this home.

Room.Name: Storage Room
Room.Description: This storage closet is full of brooms, mops, and other cleaning equipment, along with a wide variety of solvents. Despite being full of tools for cleaning, it is anything but. Rats and critters have made this home.

NPC.name: Theodore foreman
NPC.description: A short and stocky dwarf is here, concentrationg on the desk full of papers in front of him.
NPC.longDescription: The foreman of the docks is here.

NPC.name: rat
NPC.description: A rat is not happy with you disturbing its adventure to find food.

NPC.name: centipede
NPC.description: A centipede tries to inch away from the center of the room.

NPC.name: spider
NPC.description: A spider tries to scurry from your footsteps.

NPC.name: pigeon
NPC.description: A pigeon is looking for nesting materials.

NPC.name: starling
NPC.description: A beautiful starling is looking for nesting materials.

NPC.name: sparrow
NPC.description: A small sparrow is trapped and looking for a way to escape.

NPC.name: Margaret Maggie Whitman
NPC.description: Maggie Whitman is a hardy woman in her late sixties, running the renowned "Whitman's Watercraft Wares" on the waterfront of Astoria. Her silver hair, always neatly tied in a low bun, accentuates her twinkling azure eyes that seem to hold stories as deep and fascinating as the Pacific itself. Although age has bestowed her a few wrinkles, they add to the charm of her character rather than detract from her beauty. Her attire consists of practical, marine-styled clothing: a worn navy blue peacoat, a white fisherman's sweater underneath, and sturdy brown boots. Around her neck, she wears a brass pendant in the shape of an anchor, a memento from her own days at sea. Her hands are strong and calloused from years of repairing, restoring, and selling boats. She is straightforward, patient, and possesses a warm humor that has made her a beloved figure in the community. She has been a constant in Astoria, helping the city's residents and visitors navigate their boating needs. Her extensive knowledge, gained from decades of experience, makes her not only an excellent shopkeeper but also an indispensable resource for all things maritime in Astoria.
NPC.longDescription: Margaret "Maggie" Whitman is here tending to her shop and its patrons.

Item.Name: bracer charred
Item.LongDescription: You see a charred bracer here.
Item.Description: A charred leather bracer looks very comfortable wear.

Item.Name: black sleeves
Item.LongDescription: You see a pair of black sleeves here.
Item.Description: A pair of black sleeves look comfortable to wear.

Item.Name: cabinet
Item.LongDescription: A cabinet is against the wall here.
Item.Description: A cabinet against the wall is covered with cobwebs.

Item.Name: key
Item.Description: It is a small key with no inscriptions or marks of any kind.

Quest.Name: foreman_respond
Quest.Description: Respond to the Foreman's request for you to kill little critters on the docks.

Quest.Name: docks_critters_quest
Quest.Description: Kill little critters on the docks of Astoria.
